item.title: Pi Circular Digits - White Text Design for Math and Science Geeks/Nerds
item.description: A design for math geeks with the Greek letter in the center, surrounded by a circle of Pi symbols, 37 digits of Pi as circular text, and a linear circle. • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.

item.title: 10 Digits of Pi - Black Geek T-Shirt for Pi Day 2015
item.description: Pi day 2015 has a special significance on 3.14.15 at 9:26:53 a.m. and p.m. the date and time represent the first 10 digits of π. Get your shirt in time to celebrate this special occasion. / A black or dark colored shirt with light inscription showing the...
